content: I find myself highlighting sub-expressions in the infoview. It would be kind of neat if when I do that and hover, the IDE ran a bunch of standard tactics (exact, assumption, ...) and if those happen to solve that fragment, gives me the option to import that into my in-progress proof. Extra credit if it will synthesise the skeleton of an intro or apply or case block.
But we have infrastructure issues currently which prevents updating the ProofWidgets library in Mathlib.
